Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Apple Mac OS X for x86) 2008.2 (Build 526U)

Method.name: FullName
Method.Implementation: Quit ##class(%PopulateUtils).LastName()_","_##class(%PopulateUtils).FirstName()

Method.name: FullAddress
Method.Implementation: Quit ##class(%PopulateUtils).Street()_","_##class(%PopulateUtils).City()_","_##class(%PopulateUtils).USZip()_","_##class(%PopulateUtils).USState()

Method.name: Sex
Method.Implementation: Quit $LG($LB("Male","Female"), $RANDOM(2) + 1)

Method.name: Write
Method.Implementation:
Set properties = $LB("FirstName", "LastName", "Address", "State", "City","ZipCode","Sex","SSN") Set line = "" For i=1:1:$LISTLENGTH(properties) { Set value = $zobjmethod(person,$LG(properties, i)_"Get") Set:line'="" line = line_","_value Set:line="" line = value }
Quit adapter.PutLine(fileName, line)

Method.name: OnInit
Method.Implementation: Set ..personDataWriter = ##class(Operation.PersonDataWriter).%New() Quit $$$OK

Method.name: WritePerson
Method.Implementation: Quit ..personDataWriter.Write(..Adapter, pRequest, ..FileName)

XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="Production.Production" LogGeneralTraceEvents="false"> <Description></Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="LegacyPersonService" Category="" ClassName="Service.PersonService" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" InactivityTimeout="0" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="AlertGracePeriod">0</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="AlertOnError">0</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ArchiveIO">0</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Query">SELECT * FROM External.LegacyData</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="DeleteQuery"></Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="KeyFieldName">ID</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Parameters"></Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="CallInterval">5</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="DSN">EXTERNALDB</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Credentials">EXTERNALCREDS</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="StayConnected">-1</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="ConnectTimeout">5</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="PersonFileOperation" Category="" ClassName="Operation.PersonFileOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" InactivityTimeout="0" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="FileName">People.csv</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="AlertRetryGracePeriod">0</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="RetryInterval">5</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="FailureTimeout">15</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="AlertOnError">0</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ArchiveIO">0</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FilePath">/tmp/</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Overwrite">0</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Charset">Default</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="OpenTimeout">5</Setting> </Item> </Production>

Method.name: Build
Method.Implementation:
Set fullName = $LISTFROMSTRING(snapshot.Get("FullName")) Set fullAddress = $LISTFROMSTRING(snapshot.Get("FullAddress"))
Set person = ##class(DataModel.Person).%New() Set person.Address = $LG(fullAddress, 1) Set person.City = $LG(fullAddress,2) Set person.ZipCode = $LG(fullAddress,3) Set person.State = $LG(fullAddress,4)
Set person.FirstName = $LG(fullName,2) Set person.LastName = $LG(fullName,1)
Set person.Sex = snapshot.Get("Sex") Set person.SSN = snapshot.Get("SocialSecurityNumber")
Set tSC = person.%Save() Kill:$$$ISERR(tSC) person
Quit tSC

Method.name: OnInit
Method.Implementation: Set ..personRequestBuilder = ##class(Service.PersonRequestBuilder).%New() Quit $$$OK

Method.name: OnProcessInput
Method.Implementation: Set tSC = ..personRequestBuilder.Build(.pInput, .person) Do:$$$ISOK(tSC) ..SendRequestAsync("PersonFileOperation", person) Quit tSC

Method.name: OnBeforeAllTests
Method.Implementation:
Do ..ChangeSetting(,"PersonFileOperation","FilePath",##class(%SYS.System).TempDirectory())
Do ..StartProduction()
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: OnBeforeOneTest
Method.Implementation:
Do ##class(Ens.MessageHeader).%KillExtent() Do ##class(Ens.MessageBody).%KillExtent()
Do ##class(DataModel.Person).%KillExtent() Do ##class(External.LegacyData).%KillExtent()
Do ##class(%File).Delete(..PeopleFilePath())
Do ##class(EnsLib.SQL.InboundAdapter).ClearAllAppData("LegacyPersonService")
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: TestLegacyConversion
Method.Implementation:
Do ##class(External.LegacyData).Populate(2)
Do ..WaitForCallInterval("LegacyPersonService")
Do ..AssertMessageTrace("LegacyPersonService", "PersonFileOperation")
Do ..AssertFileExists(..PeopleFilePath())
Do ..LoadFileIntoStream(..PeopleFilePath(), .stream)
Do ..AssertLineInStream(..LineFromRequestId(1), .stream)
Do ..AssertLineInStream(..LineFromRequestId(2), .stream)
Do $$$AssertTrue(stream.AtEnd)

Method.name: LineFromRequestId
Method.Implementation: Set request = ##class(DataModel.Person).%OpenId(id) Quit:request="" "" Quit request.FirstName_","_request.LastName_","_request.Address_","_request.State_","_request.City_","_request.ZipCode_","_request.Sex_","_request.SSN

Method.name: OnAfterAllTests
Method.Implementation: Do ##class(External.LegacyData).%KillExtent() Do ..ChangeSetting(,"PersonFileOperation","FilePath", "/tmp/") Do ..ForceStopProduction() Quit $$$OK

Method.name: LoadFileIntoStream
Method.Implementation: Set stream = ##class(%FileCharacterStream).%New() Set stream.Filename = fileName

Method.name: AssertFileExists
Method.Implementation: Do $$$AssertTrue(##class(%File).Exists(filePath))

Method.name: WaitForCallInterval
Method.Implementation: Do ..GetSetting(..#PRODUCTION, configItem, "CallInterval", .value) Hang value

Method.name: AssertLineInStream
PeopleFilePath
Method.Implementation: Do ..GetSetting(..#PRODUCTION,"PersonFileOperation","FileName",.value) Quit ##class(%SYS.System).TempDirectory()_"/"_value

Method.name: AssertMessageTrace
Method.Implementation:
&sql(SELECT TOP 1 SessionID, TargetConfigName INTO :SessionID, :ServiceTarget FROM Ens.MessageHeader WHERE SourceConfigName = :service ORDER BY %ID,TimeCreated)
Do $$$AssertTrue($G(ServiceTarget)'="", "Could not find service '"_service_"' in messages") Do:SQLCODE=0 $$$AssertEquals(processorOrOperation, ServiceTarget, "Expected: '"_service_"' -> '"_processorOrOperation_"' Was: '"_service_"' -> '"_ServiceTarget_"'")
If operation'="" { &sql(SELECT TOP 1 TargetConfigName INTO :processorOrOperationTarget FROM Ens.MessageHeader WHERE SourceConfigName = :processorOrOperation AND SessionID = :SessionID ORDER BY %ID,TimeCreated)
Do $$$AssertTrue($G(processorOrOperationTarget)'="", "Could not find processorOrOperation '"_processorOrOperation_"' in messages") Do:SQLCODE=0 $$$AssertEquals(operation, processorOrOperationTarget, "Expected: '"_processorOrOperation_"' -> '"_operation_"' Was: '"_processorOrOperation_"' -> '"_processorOrOperationTarget_"'") }

Method.name: OnBeforeOneTest
Method.Implementation:
Set ..target = ##class(Operation.PersonDataWriter).%New() Set ..adapter = ##class(UnitTest.Stub).%New()
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: TestWritesPersonRequestOut
Method.Implementation:
Do ..adapter.Stub("PutLine", $$$OK) Set person = ..CreateHappyPerson()
Do $$$AssertStatusOK(..target.Write(..adapter, person, "Hello.txt"))
Set line = "Justin,DeWind,123 Foo,MI,Holland,49301,Male,123-12-1234" Do $$$AssertEquals(line, ..adapter.ArgsForMethod("PutLine").GetAt(2).GetValue()) Do $$$AssertEquals("Hello.txt", ..adapter.ArgsForMethod("PutLine").GetAt(1).GetValue()) Do $$$AssertEquals(1, ..adapter.InvocationCount("PutLine"))

Method.name: TestWritesPersonError
Method.Implementation:
Do ..adapter.Stub("PutLine", $$$ERR("ouch")) Set person = ..CreateHappyPerson()
Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(..target.Write(..adapter, person, "Hello.txt"))
Do $$$AssertEquals(1, ..adapter.InvocationCount("PutLine"))

Method.name: CreateHappyPerson
Method.Implementation:
Set person = ##class(DataModel.Person).%New() Set person.FirstName = "Justin" Set person.LastName = "DeWind" Set person.Address = "123 Foo" Set person.Sex = "Male" Set person.SSN = "123-12-1234" Set person.State = "MI" Set person.City = "Holland" Set person.ZipCode = "49301"
Quit person

Method.name: TestMessageMapping
Method.Implementation: Do ..AssertMessageMapping("Operation.PersonFileOperation","DataModel.Person","WritePerson")

Method.name: OnBeforeOneTest
Method.Implementation:
Do ##class(DataModel.Person).%KillExtent()
Set ..target = ##class(Service.PersonRequestBuilder).%New() Set ..snapshot = ##class(EnsLib.SQL.Snapshot).%New() Do ..snapshot.SetColNames("FullName", "FullAddress", "Sex", "SocialSecurityNumber")
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: TestBuildsPersonRequest
Method.Implementation:
Do ..snapshot.AddRow("DeWind,Justin","123 Foo Bar,Holland,49301,MI","Male","123-12-1234") Do ..snapshot.Next() Set snapshot = ..snapshot
Do $$$AssertStatusOK(..target.Build(.snapshot,.person))
Do $$$AssertEquals("DeWind", person.LastName) Do $$$AssertEquals("Justin", person.FirstName) Do $$$AssertEquals("123 Foo Bar", person.Address) Do $$$AssertEquals("Holland", person.City) Do $$$AssertEquals("49301", person.ZipCode) Do $$$AssertEquals("MI", person.State) Do $$$AssertEquals("Male", person.Sex) Do $$$AssertEquals("123-12-1234", person.SSN) Do $$$AssertTrue(person.%Id()'="")

Method.name: TestBuildsPersonBadRow
Method.Implementation:
Do ..snapshot.AddRow("DeWind,Justin","123 Foo Bar,Holland,,MI","Male","sffasf") Do ..snapshot.Next() Set snapshot = ..snapshot
Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(..target.Build(.snapshot,.person))
Do $$$AssertEquals("", $G(person))

Method.name: OnBeforeOneTest
Method.Implementation: Do ##class(DataModel.Person).%KillExtent() Quit $$$OK

Method.name: TestFields
Method.Implementation: Set person = ..CreateHappyPerson() Do $$$AssertStatusOK(person.%Save()) Do $$$AssertEquals(person, ##class(DataModel.Person).%OpenId(person.%Id()))

Method.name: TestSSNValidation
Method.Implementation:
Set person = ..CreateHappyPerson() Set person.SSN = "123-123-1234" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save()) Set person.SSN = "123-12-123" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save()) Set person.SSN = "12-12-1234" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save()) Set person.SSN = "12312-1234" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save()) Set person.SSN = "123-121234" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save()) Set person.SSN = "ABC-12-1234" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save()) Set person.SSN = "123-CD-1234" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save()) Set person.SSN = "123-12-EFGH" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save())
Set person.SSN = "321-21-4321" Do $$$AssertStatusOK(person.%Save())

Method.name: TestZipValidation
Method.Implementation:
Set person = ..CreateHappyPerson() Set person.ZipCode = "1234" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save()) Set person.ZipCode = "A1234" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save()) Set person.ZipCode = "12B34" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save())
Set person.ZipCode = "49506" Do $$$AssertStatusOK(person.%Save())

Method.name: TestSexValidation
Method.Implementation:
Set person = ..CreateHappyPerson() Set person.Sex = "Neutral" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save())
Set person.Sex = "None" Do $$$AssertStatusNotOK(person.%Save())
Set person.Sex = "Male" Do $$$AssertStatusOK(person.%Save()) Set person.Sex = "Female" Do $$$AssertStatusOK(person.%Save())

Method.name: CreateHappyPerson
Method.Implementation: Set person = ##class(DataModel.Person).%New() Set person.FirstName = "Justin" Set person.LastName = "DeWind" Set person.Address = "123 Foo" Set person.Sex = "Male" Set person.SSN = "123-12-1234" Set person.State = "MI" Set person.City = "Holland" Set person.ZipCode = 49301 Quit person

Method.name: TestPersonService
Method.Implementation:
Set config = "LegacyPersonService"
Do ..AssertGeneralSetting(config, "Enabled", 1)
Do ..AssertSetting(config, "Query", "SELECT * FROM External.LegacyData") Do ..AssertSetting(config, "KeyFieldName", "ID") Do ..AssertSetting(config, "DSN", "EXTERNALDB") Do ..AssertSetting(config, "Credentials", "EXTERNALCREDS")

Method.name: TestPersonOperation
Method.Implementation:
Set config = "PersonFileOperation"
Do ..AssertGeneralSetting(config, "Enabled", 1)
Do ..AssertSetting(config, "FileName", "People.csv") Do ..AssertSetting(config, "FilePath", "/tmp/") Do ..AssertSetting(config, "Overwrite", 0)

Method.name: Package
Method.Implementation: Quit "Tests"

Class.name: UnitTest.ContinuousIntegrationEmailAlert
Class.Description: The UnitTest.ContinuousIntegrationEmailAlert is a custom email alert that sends test failure alerts with a link to the test report for the current namespace.

Method.name: OnMessage
Method.Implementation: Set $ZT="Trap",tSC=$$$OK do { Set tMailMessage=##class(%Net.MailMessage).%New() Set tMailMessage.Subject="Test Failure alert from "_$$$SystemName_":"_pRequest.SourceConfigName set tMailMessage.Charset="iso-8859-1" Set tSC=tMailMessage.TextData.WriteLine("One or more tests failed during the test run. Click the test report link to see the failures.") Set tSC=tMailMessage.TextData.WriteLine("") Set port=$get(^%SYS("WebServer","Port"),8972) Set host = "ensdev" Set link = "http://"_host_":"_port_"/csp/"_$ZConvert($ZNSPACE, "l")_"/%25UnitTest.Report.cls?NS="_##class(%CSP.Page).EscapeURL($znspace) Set tSC=tMailMessage.TextData.WriteLine(link) Quit:$$$ISERR(tSC) Set tSC=tMailMessage.TextData.WriteLine("") Set tSC=tMailMessage.TextData.WriteLine("Alert Error:") Set tSC=tMailMessage.TextData.WriteLine(pRequest.AlertText) Set tSC=..Adapter.SendMail(tMailMessage) } while (0) Exit Quit tSC Trap Set $ZT="",tSC=$$$EnsSystemError Goto Exit

Class.name: UnitTest.ContinuousIntegrationService
Class.Description:
The UnitTest.ContinuousIntegrationServce is an Ensemble business service that uses the base Ens.InboundAdapter to execute a suite of tests perodically using Ensemble's built in production environment.

The TestSuite and PurgeTestLogs properties are available as settings to configure which test suite to execute and when to purge the unit tests logs.

Property.name: TestSuite
Property.Description: The name of the test suite that runs all of the test cases.

Property.name: PurgeTestLogs
Property.Description: Purge the test log after N number of logs. Specify -1 or any null string to never purge.

Method.name: OnProcessInput
Method.Description:
Callback purges the unit test log perodically and executes the suite of tests.

Returns whether the tests suite failed or passed.

Method.name: PurgeLogs
GetValue
Method.Implementation: Quit ..value

Method.name: SetValue
Method.Implementation: Set ..value = value

Method.name: AssertSetting
Method.Implementation: Do ..GetSetting(..#PRODUCTION, Config, Setting, .actualValue) Do $$$AssertEquals(ExpectedValue, actualValue, """"_Setting_""" setting for configuration "_Config_" - Expected: "_ExpectedValue_" Was: "_actualValue)

Method.name: AssertGeneralSetting
TestControl
Method.Implementation: Quit $$$OK

Method.name: SendRequestTo
Method.Implementation:
Set configItem = ..GetConfigItem(Config) Set target = $zobjclassmethod(configItem.ClassName, "%New", Config)
If Source'="" { Do Request.%Save() Set MessageId = Request.%Id() Set MessageClass = Request.%ClassName(1)
Do target.SendRequestAsync(Config, Request, 0)
Hang MaxWait
&sql(SELECT TOP 1 ID INTO :Id FROM Ens.MessageHeader WHERE TargetConfigName = :Config AND MessageBodyId = :MessageId AND MessageBodyClassName = :MessageClass ORDER BY ID DESC)
Do $$$AssertStatusOK(##class(Ens.MessageHeader).NewDuplicatedMessage(.newHeader,Id,,,Source)) Do $$$AssertStatusOK(##class(Ens.MessageHeader).ResendMessage(newHeader.MessageId()))
Hang MaxWait } Else { Do target.SendRequestSync(Config, Request, .Response) }

Method.name: AssertDidNotRoute
AssertRoute
Method.Implementation:
Do ..GetMostRecentRuleLog(ruleName, .log)
If $Get(log) = "" { Do $$$AssertTrue(0, "Could not find routing rule log for rule '"_ruleName_"'") } Else { Set rule = $LG($LISTFROMSTRING(log.Reason, ","), index)
Set rules = $LISTFROMSTRING(log.ReturnValue, ";") Set result = $LISTFROMSTRING($LISTGET(rules, index), ":")
Do $$$AssertEquals(ruleNumber, rule, "Rule Was: "_rule) Do $$$AssertEquals(transform, $LG(result, 3), "Transform Was: "_$LG(result, 3)) Do $$$AssertEquals(operation, $LG(result, 2), "Operation Was: "_$LG(result, 2)) }

Method.name: GetMostRecentRuleLog
Method.Implementation:
&sql(SELECT TOP 1 ID INTO :Id FROM Ens_Rule.RuleLog WHERE RuleName = :theRuleName AND Reason IS NOT NULL AND ReturnValue IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ID,TimeExecuted DESC)
Quit:$Get(Id)="" "" Set log = ##class(Ens.Rule.RuleLog).%OpenId(Id)

Method.name: ForceStopProduction
Method.Implementation: Do ..GetMacros(.Macro) Set s = ##class(Ens.Director).GetProductionStatus(.tProductionName,.tState) If $G(tState)'=Macro("eProductionStateStopped") { Do $$$LogMessage("Ensemble is not stopped") Do $$$LogMessage("Trying to stop production '"_$G(tProductionName)_"'") Do ##class(Ens.Director).StopProduction() Set s = ..WaitForState(Macro("eProductionStateStopped")) If 's { Do $$$LogMessage("Forcing production to stop") Set t0 = $ZH Do ##class(Ens.Director).StopProduction(,1) Hang ..#MAXWAIT-(($ZH-t0-.5)\1) // Wait remining number of seconds until ..#MAXWAIT minus 1 Do ##class(Ens.Director).CleanProduction(1) Set s = ..WaitForState(Macro("eProductionStateStopped")) } Do ##class(Ens.Director).CleanProduction(1) Set r = $$$AssertStatusOK(s, "Verifying Ensemble is now stopped'") If 'r Quit 0 }

Method.name: CreateMessage
Method.Implementation: Set message = ##class(EnsLib.HL7.Message).%New() Set message.DocType = docType Quit message

Method.name: EnableDisableConfig
Method.Implementation:
Set status = "Disabling" Set:enabled=1 status = "Enabling"
Quit ##class(Ens.Director).EnableConfigItem(configName, enabled)

Method.name: GetConfigItem
Method.Implementation:
Set production = ..#PRODUCTION
&sql(SELECT ID INTO :ConfigID FROM Ens_Config.Item WHERE Production=:production AND Name=:Config)
Quit ##class(Ens.Config.Item).%OpenId(ConfigID)

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation:
Set ..invocationCounts = ##class(%ArrayOfDataTypes).%New() Set ..arguments = ##class(%ArrayOfObjects).%New() Set ..returnValues = ##class(%ArrayOfObjects).%New()
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: Stub
Method.Implementation: Set wrapper = ##class(DataTypeWrapper).%New() Do wrapper.SetValue(ReturnValue) Do ..returnValues.SetAt(wrapper, Method)

Method.name: %DispatchMethod
InvocationCount
Method.Implementation: Set count = ..invocationCounts.GetAt(Method) Set:count="" count = 0 Quit count

Method.name: ArgsForMethod
Method.Implementation: Set args = ..arguments.GetAt(Method_Count) Quit:args'="" args Quit ""

Method.name: FirstArgument
Method.Implementation: Set args = ..arguments.GetAt(Method_Count) Quit:args'="" args.GetAt(1) Quit ""

Method.name: Invocation
Method.Implementation: Set invocationCount = ..invocationCounts.GetAt(name) Set invocationCount = invocationCount + 1 Do ..invocationCounts.SetAt(invocationCount, name)

Class.name: UnitTest.TestHelper
Class.Description: A test case that contains helper methods that allows it to run its tests from Studio or the Command Line.

Method.name: AssertPropertyDefinition
AssertMessageMapping
RunTestCase
Method.Implementation: do ##class(%UnitTest.Manager).RunTest(class_":"_class, "/noload/norecursive")

Method.name: RunTests
Method.Description: Runs all of the tests in the test case.
Method.Implementation: do ..RunTestCase(..%ClassName(1))

Method.name: Run
Method.Implementation: do ..RunTests()

Class.name: UnitTest.TestSuite
Class.Description: The UnitTest.TestSuite collects and executes a set of test cases in a particular package.

Parameter.name: DESTROYTESTLOGS
Parameter.Description: Determines whether to destroy the unit test log before the suite is run.

Method.name: Package
Method.Description: Abstract method that should return the name of the package where the test cases are located.

Method.name: Tests
Method.Description: Returns a list of test cases based on what is returned from the <method>Package</method> class method.

Method.name: RunTests
Method.Description:
Runs all of the tests in a particular package.

Returns whether the tests passed or failed.
Method.Implementation:
Kill:..#DESTROYTESTLOGS=1 ^|$ZNSPACE|UnitTestLog
Set tests = ..Tests() Quit:$LISTLENGTH(tests)=0 $$$OK
Set failureCount = 0
For i = 1:1:$LISTLENGTH(tests) { Do ..RunTest($LISTGET(tests, i)) Set testCount = ..GetTestCount() Set passed = ##class(%UnitTest.Report).IsSuccess($ZNSPACE, testCount, $O(^|$ZNSPACE|UnitTestLog(testCount,""))) Set:passed=0 failureCount = failureCount + 1
}
If failureCount > 0 { Quit $$$ERR(failureCount_" Test(s) Failed!") }
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: Run
Method.Implementation: Quit ..RunTests()

Method.name: GetTestCount
Method.Description: Returns the number of tests in the ^UnitTestLog for the current namespace.

Method.name: RunTest
Method.Implementation: set suite = testspec_":"_testspec quit ##class(%UnitTest.Manager).RunTest(suite, "/noload/norecursive")
